create-account.title: Create new account
create-account.already-registered: An account already exists with this email address. Try to log in instead.
create-account.password-too-simple: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and not numbers only
create-account.error: Error #01. Please report this to covid-bugs@joinzoe.com: %{msg}

login.title:
Log in to
your account
login.user-not-found-exception: We couldn't identify you. Please try again.
login.exception: Unable to log in. Please try again.

reset-password.title: Enter your email and we‚Äôll send you a link to reset your password
reset-password.error: Error #02. Please report this to covid-bugs@joinzoe.com: %{msg}

reset-password-confirm.title: Check your email
reset-password-confirm.text: We've sent you a password reset link.

optional-info.title: Optional contact information
optional-info.description: Please share your name and phone number. This is optional. If you want to share your information with another study this will help us identify you.

welcome.title: COVID Symptom Tracker
welcome.take-a-minute: Take 1 minute each day and help fight the outbreak.
welcome.disclaimer:
This app allows you to help others, but does 
 not give health advice. If you need health 
 advice please
welcome.see-how-your-area-is-affected: See how your area is affected and the discoveries you made possible
welcome.report-button: Report today, even if you're well

how-you-can-help.title: How you can help
how-you-can-help.text1: Take 1 minute a day to report how you feel, even if well. Then see how your area is affected.
how-you-can-help.text2: No information you share will be used for commercial purposes. You do not need to give us your name. This app does not give health advice.

names.harvard-th-chan-school-of-public-health: Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health

before-we-start.title: I am in an existing research study or trial, and I want my data to be shared with investigators on that study.

something-went-wrong: Something went wrong, please try again later

your-work.worked-nursing-home: Nursing home/elderly care or group care facility

label-cohort: Are you part of one of these population studies or organisations?
required-is-healthcare-worker: Please indicate if you are a healthcare worker
required-is-carer: Please indicate if you are a carer
are-you-healthcare-staff: Are you a healthcare worker (including hospital, elderly care, or in the community)
yes-interacting-patients: Yes, I currently interact with patients
yes-not-interacting-patients: Yes, but I do not currently interact with patients
are-you-carer: Do you care for multiple people in the community, with direct contact with your patients?
label-physically-worked-in-places: Since the COVID-19 epidemic began, have you physically worked in? (check all that apply)
label-interacted-with-infected-patients: Have you EVER interacted in person with patients with documented or suspected COVID-19 infection?
required-has-patient-interaction: Please indicate whether you've had contact with infected patients
label-used-ppe-equipment: Since the COVID-19 epidemic began, have you used personal protective equipment (PPE) at work?
label-used-ppe-equipment-footnote: * Depending on your specific work requirements, PPE might include gloves, masks, face shields, etc.
label-ppe-equipment-available: Is the PPE equipment you need available?
required-ppe-availability: Please specify the availability level of PPE equipment at work.
required-year-of-birth: Please enter your year of birth
correct-year-of-birth: Please correct your year of birth
your-sex-at-birth: What sex were you assigned at birth?
required-sex-at-birth: Please indicate the sex you were assigned at birth
label-gender-identity: What gender do you most identify with?
required-gender-identity: Please indicate the gender you most identify with
required-height-in-cm: Please enter your height in centimeters as a number
required-height-in-ft-in: Please enter your height in feet & inches
required-weight-in-kg: Please enter your weight in kilograms
required-weight-in-lb: Please enter your weight in pounds
required-postcode: Please enter your postcode (first part is sufficient)
postcode-too-long: Please correct your postcode (first part is sufficient)
are-you-a-member-of-twins: Are you a member of the UK Twins Study?
required-ever-exposed: Please indicate if you've been exposed to someone with COVID-19 infection
label-unwell-month-before: Have you felt unwell in the month before you started reporting on this app?
label-past-symptoms-days-ago: How many days ago did your symptoms start?
label-past-symptoms-changed: How have your symptoms changed over the last few days?
label-past-symptoms-had-covid: Do you think you have already had COVID-19, but were not tested?
label-past-symptoms-classic: Did you have the classic symptoms (high fever and persistent cough) for several days?
label-past-symptoms: Did you have any of the following symptoms (please select all that apply):
label-past-symptom-chest-pain: Unusual chest pain or tightness in your chest

your-health.health-problems-that-limit-activity: In general, do you have any health problems that require you to limit your activities?
your-health.have-lung-disease: Do you have lung disease or asthma?
your-health.years-since-last-smoked: How many years since you last smoked?
your-health.what-cancer-type: What type of cancer do you have?
your-health.is-on-chemotherapy: Are you on chemotherapy or immunotherapy for cancer?
your-health.takes-immunosuppressant: Do you regularly take immunosuppressant medications (including steroids, methotrexate, biologic agents)?
your-health.takes-asprin: Do you regularly take aspirin (baby aspirin or standard dose)?
your-health.takes-nsaids: Do you regularly take "NSAIDs" like ibuprofen, nurofen, diclofenac, naproxen?
your-health.takes-any-blood-pressure-medication: Are you regularly taking any blood pressure medications?
your-health.takes-pril-blood-pressure-medication: Are you regularly taking blood pressure medications ending in "-pril", such as enalapril, lisinopril, captopril, ramipril?
your-health.takes-sartan-blood-pressure-medication: Are you regularly taking blood pressure medications ending in "-sartan", such as losarton, valsartan, irbesartan?

covid-test.question-has-covid-test: Have you had a test for COVID-19?
covid-test.question-has-covid-positive: Did you test positive for COVID-19?
covid-test.question-takes-any-blood-pressure-medica: Are you regularly taking any blood pressure medications?

describe-symptoms.page-title: Describe the symptoms you are experiencing right now.
describe-symptoms.question-your-temperature: If you are able to measure it, what is your temperature?
describe-symptoms.question-has-persistent-cough: Do you have a persistent cough (coughing a lot for more than an hour, or 3 or more coughing episodes in 24 hours)?
describe-symptoms.picker-fatigue-severe: Severe fatigue - I struggle to get out of bed
describe-symptoms.question-has-unusual-shortness-of-breath: Are you experiencing unusual shortness of breath?
describe-symptoms.picker-shortness-of-breath-mild: Yes. Mild symptoms - slight shortness of breath during ordinary activity
describe-symptoms.picker-shortness-of-breath-significant: Yes. Significant symptoms - breathing is comfortable only at rest
describe-symptoms.picker-shortness-of-breath-severe: Yes. Severe symptoms - breathing is difficult even at rest
describe-symptoms.question-has-sore-throat: Do you have a sore throat?
describe-symptoms.question-has-loss-of-smell: Do you have a loss of smell/taste?
describe-symptoms.question-has-hoarse-voice: Do you have an unusually hoarse voice?
describe-symptoms.question-has-chest-pain: Are you feeling an unusual chest pain or tightness in your chest?
describe-symptoms.question-has-abdominal-pain: Do you have an unusual abdominal pain?
describe-symptoms.question-has-unusual-muscle-pains: Do you have unusual strong muscle pains?
describe-symptoms.question-has-delirium: Do you have any of the following symptoms: confusion, disorientation or drowsiness?
describe-symptoms.question-other-symptoms: Are there other important symptoms you want to share with us?

health-worker-exposure-question-interact: In the last day, have you interacted with any patients?
health-worker-exposure-question-treated-: In the last day, did you treat patients in person with documented or presumed COVID-19 infection?
health-worker-exposure-picker-patient-in: Yes, both documented and suspected COVID-19 cases
health-worker-exposure-question-has-used: In the last day, did you use personal protective equipment (PPE) at work? *Depending on your specific work requirements, PPE might include gloves, masks, face shields, etc.
health-worker-exposure-picker-ppe-always: I have had all the PPE I need for work
I had to reuse PPE because of shortage
health-worker-exposure-picker-ppe-someti: I haven't always needed to use PPE, but have had enough when I did
I would have used PPE all the time, but I haven't had enough
I've had to reuse PPE because of shortage
health-worker-exposure-picker-ppe-never-: I needed PPE, but it was not available

how-you-feel.question-health-status: How do you feel physically right now?

level-of-isolation.question-level-of-isolation: How much have you been isolating over the last week?
level-of-isolation.picker-not-left-the-house: I have not left the house
level-of-isolation.picker-rarely-left-the-house: I rarely leave the house and when I do, I have little interaction with others (eg for exercise)
level-of-isolation.picker-rarely-left-the-house-but-visited: I rarely leave the house but had to visit somewhere with lots of people (e.g. hospital/clinic, groceries)
level-of-isolation.picker-often-left-the-house: I have to leave the house often and am in contact with other people (eg still working outside the house or using public transport)

where-are-you.picker-location-home: I'm at home. I haven't been to a hospital for suspected COVID-19 symptoms.
where-are-you.picker-location-hospital: I am at the hospital with suspected COVID-19 symptoms.
where-are-you.picker-location-back-from-hospital: I am back from the hospital, I'd like to tell you about my treatment.
where-are-you.picker-location-back-from-hospital-alrea: I am back from the hospital, I've already told you about my treatment.

treatment-other-title-after: What treatment did you receive while in the hospital?
treatment-other-title-during: What treatment are you receiving in hospital?
treatment-other-question-treatment-after: What medical treatment did you receive?
treatment-other-question-treatment-durin: What medical treatment are you receiving?
treatment-selection-title-after: What treatment did you receive while in the hospital?
treatment-selection-title-during: What treatment are you receiving right now?
treatment-selection-picker-subtext-oxyge: * Breathing support through an oxygen mask, no pressure applied.
treatment-selection-picker-subtext-non-i: * Breathing support through an oxygen mask, which pushes oxygen into your lungs.
treatment-selection-picker-subtext-invas: * Breathing support through an inserted tube. People are usually asleep for this procedure.
do-you-use-a-stick: Do you regularly use a stick, walking frame or wheelchair to get about?
have-you-been-exposed: Have you EVER been exposed to someone with documented or suspected COVID-19 infection (such as co-workers, family members, or others)
exposed-both: Yes, both documented & suspected COVID-19 cases
housebound-problems: In general, do you have any health problems that require you to stay at home?
needs-help: Do you need someone to help you on a regular basis?
help-available: If you need help, can you count on someone close to you?
mobility-aid: Do you regularly use a stick, walking frame or wheelchair to get about?
share-with-friends-message: Help slow the spread of #COVID19 and identify at risk cases sooner by self-reporting your symptoms daily, even if you feel well  üôè. Download the app
required-treated-patients-with-covid: Please indicate whether you've treated any patients with COVID-19 in the last day
required-has-used-ppe-equipment: Please indicate how often you've used PPE equipment
required-ppe-availability-always: Please indicate the availability of PPE equipment to you
required-ppe-availability-sometimes: Please indicate the availability of PPE equipment to you
required-ppe-availability-never: Please indicate the availability of PPE equipment to you
thank-you-title: Thank you for your help and vital contribution to the study of COVID-19.
thank-you-body: Thank you for joining millions of people supporting scientists at King‚Äôs College London to help our health services.
check-in-tomorrow: We would appreciate it if you could check back in tomorrow if you feel up to it.
check-news-feed: Please check our news feed for updates.
delete-data-alert-text: Deleting your account and data cannot be undone.
your-country-text: We're not certain which country you're in because of how your phone is configured.
adult-or-child-title: Who would you like to report for?
adult-or-child-text: Right now, you can only create additional profiles for UK residents.
child-consent-confirm: I confirm that I am the child's legal guardian and that I have done the above
child-consent-text-1: If your child is old enough to understand our
child-consent-text-2: requirements, please explain to them that you are sharing information about them with us and what we are going to do with it. If you think that your child is old enough to make their own decisions, please confirm that they have consented to your sharing their data with us.
adult-consent-text-1: Please confirm that you have shown or read our
adult-consent-text-2: screen to the individual on whose behalf you are entering the data, that they are 18 or over, and that they have given their consent for you to share their data with us.
create-profile-text: This name is just for you. Choose a name that would allow you to know which person you are reporting for.
report-for-others-title: Reporting on behalf of someone else?
report-for-others-text: You can now create profiles for other people on whose behalf you want to report.
report-for-others-subtext: You can now report on behalf of someone else.
report-for-others-not-right-now: Not right now? You can add additional profiles from the menu icon above at any time.
select-profile-title: Select profile you want to report for
validation-error-text: Please fill in or correct the above information: %{info}
validation-error-text-no-info: Please fill in or correct the above information
race-question: Which of the following best describes your ethnicity?
uk-asian: Asian/Asian British - Indian, Pakistani, Bangladeshi, other
uk-mixed-white-black: Mixed race - White and Black/Black British
uk-middle-eastern: Middle Eastern/Middle Eastern British - Arab, Turkish, other
us-hawaiian_pacific: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander
hispanic: Hispanic or Latino or Spanish origin
not-hispanic: Not Hispanic or Latino, or Spanish origin
profile-name-too-long: Enter a profile name with less that 32 characters
